title: Upcoming Guidance for First Lady Michelle Obama | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the First Lady


For Immediate Release
September 27, 2016

 



Upcoming Guidance for First Lady Michelle Obama





Wednesday, September 28th

	On Wednesday, September 28, First Lady Michelle Obama will campaign for Hillary Clinton and Tim Kaine in both the Philadelphia and Pittsburgh areas.

Philadelphia, PA * 12:00 PM ET  –  First Lady Michelle Obama will campaign for Hillary Clinton and Tim Kaine at LaSalle University.

Pittsburgh, PA * 3:30 PM ET – First Lady Michelle Obama will campaign for Hillary Clinton and Tim Kaine at the University of Pittsburgh.
